Has the Scottish civil service become too politicised?

June 5, 2020

https://mercinon.wordpress.com/2020/06/04/has-the-scottish-civil-service-become-too-politicised/

Ms Evans is a civil servant. Civil servants are the paid employees of the state. They are subject to a Civil Service Code which sets out the standards expected of them. The UK government and the devolved administrations share a unified civil service but each has a separate code for its particular circumstances. You can find the Scottish Civil Service code here.

Why I'm Not A "Unionist"

June 5, 2020

One of the main techniques extremist groups like Nationalists use to make themselves appear normal is to label their opponents something they would like them to be and then attack that label.

By labelling their opponents as “Unionists” or “Yoons” they associate them with Union Jacks, British bulldogs, Churchill, and The Queen.

(Of course the Union that the Nationalists almost always imagine is English — they never include Northern Ireland or Wales, or the Scottish people who are part of Britain.)
